0.title: Sanitary Napkins
0.description:
• Cleaner for women's genital area by maintaining the natural pH of the body.
  • Disinfectant, contains non-allergenic and plant cleaning materials.
  • It has anti-inflammatory, antifungal and antimicrobial properties
  • Deodorant and removes the unpleasant odor of the genital area
  • Contains calendula extract, tea tree and aloe vera
  • Compatible with the skin and maintaining its health and calmness
  • Free of alcohol, paraben and soap
  • The best choice for menstrual hygiene
  • Quantity: 20 sheets
